1571873740_1L57bAnYhk7t2TpgdB2cSmyU6WGLJ.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_38_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): I have no idea about pirating switch games. How does this work exactly? I'm planning on getting a lite soon. Is it safe? able to avoid bans? or is it played only in the emulators? is there any brick risk? does it rely on emunand/tethering/etc?

Currently the Switch Lite is not hackable.  Any switch made before June 2018 is hackable, no matter what. Later ones depends on what firmware they have.  Here's the best guide:  https://nh-server.github.io/switch-guide/user_guide/getting_started/#determining-if-your-switch-is-vulnerable
